template<typename T, typename U> gdal_raster<T> create_temp_gdal_raster_from_model(const gdal_raster<U>& model, GDALDataType datatype)

section.title: Description
section.para: This function creates a temporary TIFF raster file dataset and returns a gdal_raster<T> associated with the opened raster dataset. When the gdal_raster<T> is deleted, the associated dataset is deleted too.The created dataset has the same number of rows and columns as the model dataset and also has the same spatial reference and cell size. It does not copy over the values of model.

section.title: Type requirements
section.para: T must be POD and fit within the space associated. If the datatype is not specified native_data_type<T>::type is the default.

section.title: Preconditions
section.para: The file specified as path must not exist, or if it exists may not be opened. Any existing file will be deleted and replaced by the new raster dataset
